statements: DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE id = 1 AND access_level = 'admin';
DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Restricted' OR access_level = 'user';
DELETE FROM access_control_lists WHERE acl_id = 2 AND policy_id = 1;
DELETE FROM AccessControlLists WHERE table_name = 'users' AND access_level = 'admin';
DELETE FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 101 AND resource_id = 201;
DELETE FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 123 AND resource_id = 456;
